Linux Basics

Guide to getting started with Linux. Covers burning an iso to a thumbdrive, installing the OS alongside Windows, and how to learn the basics of linux. There are some quick tips at the end that I recommend saving you time/pain when it comes to using Linux
Starting with Raspberry Pi

This guide will teach you how to start working with your Raspberry Pi headless (without a screen and keyboard attached), including the basics like flashing your boot image, configuring your Pi, and connecting to it via SSH

Guide to contributing to this site
